attributes.action: Charge foreign trucks for use of the UK road system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are all these foreign trucks allowed to use and damage the UK road system and yet pay no road tax whatsoever?  UK hauliers when driving abroad pay not only the UK road tax but also pay road tolls, road tax, vignettes etc, when travelling through every other country. Imagine the revenue this would create - so why aren't we doing it?
